desc: 100% organic sateen (bamboo and silver) bedding designed with your skin in mind. Clinically proven to reduce bacterial-acne and breakouts while you sleep by 99.9%. Hypoallergenic, highly breathable and temperature regulating bedsheets. Anti-acne pillowcases. Mold, dust mites and odor-resistant. Shop today.

layout.text: Plant-based bedding designed for clear skin
Derme Home is clinically proven to reduce 99.9% of acne-causing bacteria. We ethically produce organically sourced bamboo bonded with pure silver (Ag+) for permanent results.
